sentence.Network_en: The police are beating the town for the escapee.
sentence.Network_cn: 警方正在镇上搜捕那个逃犯.

sentence.Network_en: The escapee's turnup is expected soon.
sentence.Network_cn: 预料很快就会出现逃亡者.

sentence.Network_en: Why do you always shoot him? He is not the No.1 escapee.
sentence.Network_cn: 你怎么老是拍他,他又不是一级逃犯.

entry.def: An escapee is a person who has escaped from somewhere, especially from prison.

auth_sentence.content: The Taliban put The Wall Street Journal in touch by telephone with the escapee.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Taliban put The Wall Street Journal in touch by telephone with the escapee.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Taliban put The Wall Street Journal in touch by telephone with the escapee.

auth_sentence.content: I tracked those guys down and one guy not only was a survivor of a camp, but an escapee.
